name: TAP! GRETA!
description:
TAP! GRETA!

In this little tap adventure, you help Greta Thunberg save the future of this great planet from Climate Change! Collect followers and make an impact on political affairs to make BIG changes to our ecosystems. Every small step makes a huge difference!

Only available of Google Play Store. There are NO ads or micro-transaction, nor would there ever be! If you should ever seen this app elsewhere with the following, please be sure to make a report immediately.

Enjoy changing the world, one tap at a time!
